title: Position mission icon next to folder icon with proper spacing

requirements.text: Position the mission icon (MissionsButton component) next to the folder icon (FoldersButton component) with appropriate spacing between them for visual separation. Do not change any other functionality or features of the application.

quotes: Τοποθέτησε το εικονίδιο της λειτουργίας mission δίπλα από το εικονίδιο της λειτουργίας folder με σωστό κενό ανάμεσα τους για να ξεχωρίζουν . Μην αλλάξεις τίποτα άλλο στην εφαρμογή και στις λειτουργίες της .

acceptanceCriteria: Mission icon appears horizontally adjacent to folder icon
Spacing between the two icons provides clear visual distinction
Both icons maintain their existing functionality
No other application features or behaviors are modified

constraints: Do not modify any application functionality beyond icon positioning
Preserve all existing features and behaviors
Maintain existing hover effects and interactions for both buttons
nonGoals: Modifying button functionality or click handlers
Adjusting other UI elements or layout
